parameters.name: ConfigName
parameters.description: Name of the configuration to set

title: IAssemblyDoc.SetDroppedFileConfigName
description: Sets the configuration name for the recently dropped file.

parameters.name: ConfigName
parameters.description: Name of the configuration to set

returns: True if the name is successfully set, false if not
remarks:
If the configuration name is set in response to the
FileDropNotify
event, SOLIDWORKS does not display the dialog for the selected configuration names when a file is dropped in an assembly.
